snippet: It has been 200 years since a president succeeding a two-term president from the same party was re-elected, a writer notes....
lead_paragraph: It has been 200 years since a president succeeding a two-term president from the same party was re-elected, a writer notes.

headline.print_headline: A Comforting History Lesson for Republicans
headline.main: A Comforting History Lesson for Republicans
